website_summaries.verdict: A well-crafted swimsuit set that holds up well to regular wear and washing. Tough and durable without sacrificing comfort.
pros: Polyester and spandex construction is durable, flexible, and quick drying
Rash guard has a 50+ UPF rating and a high neck for upper body sun protection
cons: Sizes run small, especially the rash guard

customer_reviews.title: shirt is way too small
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a size 5 for my son who typically wears that size. As soon as I took out the shirt I realized I should have sized up. The shirt looks more like a size 3 but the shorts fit great with some room to spare. Bummer. I plan to pair the shorts with a different rashguard top. They are super cute.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Too small, shorts big.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son and it fits him...sort of. The top is on the smaller side and the shorts are big. We kept it anyway and he wears it, but the shirt won’t last past this summer. He will probably still be able to wear the shorts next year. They have an adjustable drawstring which helped.
customer_reviews.author: Whitthewhat?!

customer_reviews.title: Great set! Grandson loved it. Well made!
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for our grandson. He had wanted a set by another company, but he loves orange and Body Glove has always made quality products. He loved it! HUGE hit and fits perfectly, good price point, and extremely well made.
customer_reviews.author: Yardley

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Great bathing suit for my 8 year old. I will say the shirt is a bit tight and small, but served it’s purpose! The shorts will fit next year, but the shirt will be too small. Great value!
customer_reviews.author: Nurseandmommy

customer_reviews.title: Waist too big
customer_reviews.text: They were too big around the waist for my 6 year old but overall good quality.
customer_reviews.author: DNA Mom and Dad

customer_reviews.title: Cute shark suit
customer_reviews.text: My son has been wearing this weekly to swim class and it’s holding up really well.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. T

customer_reviews.title: What sharks
customer_reviews.text: I loved the quality except I bought it because my Grandson loves sharks and it is advertised as such....the bathing suit has porpoises on it instead. I would not have bought it knowing that, however it is a birthday present and too late. The quality is superb though
customer_reviews.author: Sharon C.

customer_reviews.title: Cute swim suit
customer_reviews.text: Very cute. Smelled apon arrival but went away after first wash.
customer_reviews.author: Guzmanna

customer_reviews.title: Cute but small
customer_reviews.text: Very cute but top was very small My son didn’t get much use of top bc it was too tight
customer_reviews.author: Samantha miller

customer_reviews.title: Rash guard runs very small
customer_reviews.text: The swim trunks fit very nicely. The rash guard was very small. My grandson was unable to get it all the way on because it was so tight. Too bad, because it’s a really nice looking combination.
customer_reviews.author: Granny Nanny

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Loved it! Ordered it last minute for a trip to the beach and legoland. It fit my son just perfectly if you follow the fitting guide.
customer_reviews.author: Lilli

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: My son is so happy that it fits him perfectly. Usually shirts are loose and baggy and it makes him cold. This shirt is fitted and looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Angie88

customer_reviews.title: Shirt Too Small
customer_reviews.text: The shorts fit great but the shirt seemed like it was two sizes too small.
customer_reviews.author: Felipe Ochoa Jr.

customer_reviews.title: great quality
customer_reviews.text: These fit great, looks good and has a nice quality material
customer_reviews.author: Jamie J

product_meta.title: Body Glove Boys 2-Piece UPF 50+ Rash Guard Swimsuit Set
product_meta.description:
Body Glove Boys' 2-Piece Rash Guard and Swim Trunk Set is the perfect choice for a summer full of fun splashing in the pool and hanging out at the beach. Short sleeve rash guard adds additional sun cover protection for delicate skin. Choose from several cool, coordinating designs for a summer filled with memories! 

 * Short Sleeve Rash Guard - Rash guards add an additional layer of sun protection to protect your child's skin from harsh, damaging UV rays. An essential garment for a safe and fun summer in the sun. 
 * Matching Trunk Shorts - Each set comes with coordinating elastic waist swim trunks with fun patterns and bright colors for a youthful look. 
 * Adorable Designs - Your beach bum will be the center of attention with his Body Glove swim set! Choose from a wide variety of designs including with vibrant colors and themes. 
 * Perfect for Vacation - You will love to share all your vacation photos of your kids splashing around in the sun with these cool coordinating sets. 
 *  High Quality - Superior fabric and construction will hold up to a summer full of chlorine, sand, and washing and will look bright all season long. 
 * Easy Care - Simply machine wash and tumble dry; Please Reference the Variations for All Available Sizes & Colors! 

Body Glove Offers Premium Clothing at Affordable Prices because we value every customer that visits our listings! Stop by Our Storefront to See the Rest of Our Great Deals; we're confident you're going to find items that anyone who needs a gift will absolutely love and adore!
feature_bullets: Rash Guard Top: 92% Polyester/8% Spandex; Bathing Suit Short: 100% Polyester
Perfect for Vacation - Snap the perfect vacation pics looking cool at the pool or catching waves at the beach in this high quality swim set
Short Sleeve Rash Guard - Protective shirt provides the ultimate sun cover protection for your child while making a splash in the pool
Matching Trunk Shorts - Elastic waist swim trunks coordinate perfectly with the short sleeve rash guard shirt for a cool, playful look
Adorable Designs - Choose from several graphic designs with fun, vibrant colors that will look great on your beach bum
Easy Care; Machine Wash, Tumble Dry; Please Reference Product Description for More Details
